archimate:Node.name: Comcam Test Stand ITC (node)
archimate:Node.documentation:
The Spectrograph Test Stand is a node that supports the spectrograph Archiver, supporting control systems and a disk buffer that is not required to be a fully functional Observatory Operations server. The buffer exposes recently acquired data from the spectrograph camera to users of the spectrograph test stand.
Thsi node it deployed in Tuscon
